title: The 1 Bar
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, International, Thai, Western, Beer/Wine, British, English, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Western bar offering drinks and British pub food like pizza and pasta in addition to extensive Thai food menu. The owner is willing to accommodate vegans for special occasions or when you let him know in advance.
streetAddress: 700/3 Sanambin Rd, Nai Mueng, Mueng Chaiyaphum
